entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY THIS MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
NORTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
COOLER WITH LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING WEST 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
NORTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
HIGHS AROUND 40

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 40 PERCENT CHANCE OF RAIN SHOWERS
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 30S

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
